title: Shinzo Abe’s Assassination Draws Grief and Shock From World Leaders
sub_head: Tributes to the former Japanese prime minister underscored his impact on the region
body:
Messages filled with personal tributes and shock over the assassination of former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe poured in from world leaders, underscoring his impact on the region and the alliances he forged during his time as the country’s premier.
In the U.S., many politicians said that the country had lost a champion of the U.S.-Japan alliance with Mr. Abe’s death.
